summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6178 for the improvement of Williams Avenue from approximately 150 feet north of Emerson Street to Emerson Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements; by constructing sewers and otherwise the same; under Ordinance No. 87064, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
